dialogueContent.words: We've received very little intel on this situation. We just know they went dark and we assume jamming is involved. Careful out there, Commander.
Great job, Commander! They always say you can't judge these types of contracts.
The loss of that position will come at a bad time for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}. No good news for us either.
Strange. There looks like there's been fighting here but it was a least a few weeks ago. Let's look up on ahead. Maybe we'll find something at the other base.
What's this?! The turrets are activating. Incoming fire, Commander!
We were told to expect interference. Time to shut you out.
This isn't good, Commander. You're surrounded!
Hey! That base's automated turrets are spinning up. Lucky us!
Is everything ok down there, Commander? Looks like those turrets were hacked. Something is definitely not right here. Let's move on to the next base.
How did these guys get the jump on us? We've been getting too much bad intel. This is now officially a hot zone. Let's continue our investigation. Expect more OpFor, Commander.
Unidentified BattleMech lance. Declare yourself. You are violating a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} militarised zone
{TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} radio operator. We are {COMPANY.CompanyName} and have been hired to check the sit rep here. You've been out of contact for weeks. Everything ok here?
Everything's fi..***STATIC***
Commander! It's a trap! Watch ou...***STATIC***
Damn it! Gun them down now!
It's me again, Commander! I'm going to try and activate the turrets... ***BANG***
That sorts you out. Thanks for unlocking those turrets for us.
Commander, this isn't good. Watch out for those base defenses!
It's me again, Commander! I've managed to activate our base defenses. Locked them all shortly before we lost control. Give them hell!
Commander! Are we glad to see you! {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forward base {TGT_SYSTEM.name}-Alpha.
We've been holding off assaults on our position for the past few weeks. We've fallen back to this base but we can't hold out for much longer.
We've got contacts! Incoming!

longDescription: Forward base is a little misleading, Commander. I've heard rumours it's more a spy station. Let's go find out what's going on.

objectiveList.description: Survive the turret trap in alpha base
objectiveList.title: Survive the trap

objectiveList.description: Follow the trail to the next base
objectiveList.title: Follow the Trail

objectiveList.description: Destroy the lance that is invading
objectiveList.title: Destroy invading lance

objectiveList.description: Destroy the lance that is occupying the base
objectiveList.title: Destroy occupying lance

objectiveList.description: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base
objectiveList.title: Destroy the hacked base turrets

shortDescription: We recently lost contact with one of our forward bases in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system. We've heard rumours of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity near here so it might be related. We need you to go in and investigate for us.
